category: Herbs that Transform Phlegm and Stop Coughing

action.primary: Moistens and cools the Lungs, resolves Phlegm and stops cough

indications: Coughing due to Lung Heat or Dryness
Chronic daytime cough with or without sputum

action.primary: Generates body Fluids and relieves thirst

indications: Summerheat Injuring the Body Fluids with thirst

action.primary: Moistens the Intestines and unblocks the bowels

useCases: Cough from Damp-Phlegm lingering in the Lungs
A dry throat and thirst from Summerheat injuring the Fluids
Constipation due to deplete Fluids from Lung qi not being disseminated
